div.p: Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Dosage|5.0.0 to unspecified code system

tr.td: FHIR R5 ComplexType `Dosage` is representable via FHIR R4 extensions. Element `Dosage` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Dosage`.
Element `Dosage.sequence` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Dosage.sequence`.
Element `Dosage.text` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Dosage.text`.
Element `Dosage.additionalInstruction` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Dosage.additionalInstruction`.
Element `Dosage.patientInstruction` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Dosage.patientInstruction`.
Element `Dosage.timing` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Dosage.timing`.

Note that the target element context `Dosage.asNeeded[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Dosage`. Element `Dosage.asNeeded` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Dosage.asNeeded[x]`. Note that the target element context `Dosage.asNeeded[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Dosage`.

Note that the target element context `Dosage.asNeeded[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Dosage`. Element `Dosage.asNeededFor` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Dosage.asNeeded[x]`. Note that the target element context `Dosage.asNeeded[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Dosage`.
Element `Dosage.site` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Dosage.site`.
Element `Dosage.route` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Dosage.route`.
Element `Dosage.method` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Dosage.method`.
Element `Dosage.doseAndRate` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Dosage.doseAndRate`.
Element `Dosage.doseAndRate.type` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Dosage.doseAndRate.type`.

Note that the target element context `Dosage.doseAndRate.dose[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Dosage.doseAndRate`. Element `Dosage.doseAndRate.dose[x]` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Dosage.doseAndRate.dose[x]`. Note that the target element context `Dosage.doseAndRate.dose[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Dosage.doseAndRate`.

Note that the target element context `Dosage.doseAndRate.rate[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Dosage.doseAndRate`. Element `Dosage.doseAndRate.rate[x]` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Dosage.doseAndRate.rate[x]`. Note that the target element context `Dosage.doseAndRate.rate[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Dosage.doseAndRate`.
Element `Dosage.maxDosePerPeriod` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Dosage.maxDosePerPeriod`.
Element `Dosage.maxDosePerAdministration` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Dosage.maxDosePerAdministration`.
Element `Dosage.maxDosePerLifetime` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Dosage.maxDosePerLifetime`.

title.value: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4

description.value: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.
